document.full_text: 'the shaughraun,' dion boucicault's 19th-century mix of comedy and melodrama, is being given a lively, loving production at the irish repertory theater.
document.title: theater review | 'the shaughraun': hiss at the villain, cheer the vagabond
lines_and_colors: 'the shaughraun,' dion boucicault's 19th-century mix of comedy and melodrama, is being given a lively, loving production at the irish repertory theater.
